extendedInfo.description: * This application works in partnership with the BabyCam Monitor application available for Android.  BabyCam Receiver allows you to receive the full video and audio stream from BabyCam Monitor directly on your Android device so you can always keep your eyes on your baby no matter where you are in your house.  Following is a description of BabyCam Monitor ... *Welcome to the future of baby monitoring!  This application will turn your Android phone or tablet into a fully functioning, high quality baby monitor.  It uses your home WiFi network to stream video and audio of your baby from the camera on your Android device directly to a web browser on your computer or laptop, or to any other Android device that is attached to your home WiFi network!  So you can be sat downstairs watching a film while your baby sleeps upstairs, allowing you to just flick your laptop open to see and hear exactly what your baby is doing.  Or you can quickly pull your phone out of your pocket while you are cooking dinner in the kitchen to have a quick peek at what mischief your child is causing in their bedroom.Youâll be amazed by the high quality video and audio as well as all the features that let you remotely interact with your baby via the web browser, such as playing lullabies on the Android deviceâs speaker, or switching the Night Light (the camera flash LED) on or off.  With advanced motion detection and monitoring features that chart your babyâs every movement, you have the most efficient possible way to ensure your baby is safe from harm while you are not in the room with them.As you can see, it has all the functionality of the most expensive baby monitors on the market today, but also with added premium features that make this application simply the best way to monitor your baby in this day and age.  Why spend a huge wad of cash on an expensive baby monitor with low quality video and audio when for just a tiny fraction of the price you can spend a small handful of change on this application which offers the same and so much more?------FEATURES1. Monitor you baby by streaming real-time live video and audio from your Android device camera to a web browser or to any other Android device;2. Very simple to use for everybody - no configuration needed ... it just works!3. Switch on Motion Detection to get pinpoint accuracy of every movement your baby makes as well as a handy real-time graph that shows the intensity of movements over time.4. Volume controls and a visual representation of the audio, so you have the option of not listening to the sound but still remain aware of the noises your baby is making;5. Interact with your baby even though you are not in the room â using buttons on the web browser you can switch the Night Light on and off (if your Android device has a camera flash LED) and you can also play lullabies through the Android device speaker, again just by clicking a button in the web browser;6. Remotely control the camera!  Capture precious moments that youâd otherwise miss by taking high resolution pictures and videos using buttons on the web browser; 7. Requires Java installed on the web browser computer; 8. Advanced settings to tweak performance with a choice of streaming resolutions;10. Only uses a WiFi network â does NOT support 3G.  You can stream across the internet by using Port Forwarding â please contact the developer for help doing this;11. LOTS more features in development!------* Before emailing, check FAQs at http://dooblou.blogspot.com ** Follow @dooblou on Twitter for all the latest news and updates as they occur ** Find us on Facebook â Search for âBabyCam Monitorâ *

reviews.title: Okay until it stops working
reviews.comment: I thought I could make this a permanent baby monitor but it does not keep running in the background. Volume is low and there is a slight delay. Had to purchase a real baby monitor
reviews.author: Jeffrey Nkansah

reviews.title: Still some work to be done
Very well done!
reviews.comment: Great app, very easy to use and works perfectly. Thank you!
reviews.author: Ryan Monsma

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: Really comes in handy when a dad like myself panics at every little whimper my baby does and now I don\'t have to run across my house to see if my baby\'s OK. Cost is much better than those video monitors that they sell in stores. Would like to talk to my child through the app but oh well. Nice job dev.
reviews.author: Charles Phillips

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Works like a charm. This is an extremely cheap and effective solution, especially I you have an old android device laying around. I had one small issue with my router settings and that got solved quickly through great developer support.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: This is the most liberating app I have ever found. It just simply works. Thank you so much.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love the App/ 1 request
reviews.comment: Love this app so that I can leave my tablet in my daughter\'s room with it proped so the camera see\'s her.  I would however love to see the ability to use over cellular (3G or 4G) for tines when I may go outside of my home WiFi reach when in the yard.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wery good.
reviews.comment: But sometimes it\'s not possible to connect with CamMonitor.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Rip off
reviews.comment: They offer a free demo on the sender but this means you have to buy the reciever. No option for refund. Pretty annoying
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: baby cam  receiver
reviews.comment: i paid for this and it doesnt work
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great addition to monitor
reviews.comment: I was looking for something that would tie in the the babycam monitor i already have, this lets me easily tune in to the monitor on my phone or tablet
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This puts the icing on the cake. Complements perfectly the babycam monitor. Great quality, no issues whatsoever
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great application very easy to use
reviews.comment: This is absolutely essential when using the babycam monitor.Lots of convenience to carry in your pocket and keep an eye on your little one.
reviews.author: A Google User
